graphql.query:
mutation{

  addListing(
    listing_id: "L002",
    listing_title: "asdasdas asd asd assd asd asd ",
    description: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod ",
    street: "13 xyz Street",
    city: "Chennai",
    postal_code: "600001",
    single_price: 1000,
    double_price: 2000,
    email: "admin@gmail.com",   
    username: "admin",
    created:"2022-05-01"
    
  ){
    listing_id
    listing_title
    description
    street
    city
    postal_code
  	single_price
    double_price
    single_count
    double_count
    email
    username
    type
    created
    token
  }
  
}

query{
  getListingCreatedByAdmin(
    type:"admin"
  ){
    listing_id
    listing_title
    description
    street
    city
    postal_code
    single_price
    double_price
    single_count
    double_count
    email
    username
    type
    created
    token
  }
}

mutation{
  addBooking(
    listing_id: "L004",
    booking_id: "B005",
    booking_date: "05-01-2022",
    single_room: "1",
     double_room: "1",
    booking_start: "05-01-2022",
    booking_end: "05-05-2022",
    username: "hmzkoc"
  ){
    listing_id
    booking_id
    booking_date
    single_room
     double_room
    booking_start
    booking_end
    username
  }
}

query{
  getListingByCity(
    city : "Chennai"
  ){
     listing_id
    listing_title
    description
    street
    city
    postal_code
    single_price
    double_price
    single_count
    single_count
    email
    username
    type
    created
  }
  
}
